content: of round *2 tc in next chain-1 space chain 1 repeat from * around to last chain-1 space 1 tc in last chain-1 space join with slip_stitch to 4 chain of the starting chain 16 18 20 clusters cll snray ewe ewe 7102 © thgirypoc 1 ver round 16 gently lift color a behind work with color a chain 1 1 single_crochet in each chain-1 space around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 16 18 20 single_crochet round 17 with color b chain 4 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet around sl st to top of the starting chain 16 18 20 tc round 18 with color a chain 1 decrease around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 8 9 10 single_crochet round 19 with color b chain 1 decrease around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 4 5 5 single_crochet cut color b leaving a 6 tail pull through last st to finish off with a darning needle weave tail through last sts to close gap with color a make a 2½ pom pom if desired and securely attach to top of hat love stitch bpdc back post double repeat repeat crochet skip skip glossary chain chain sl slip double_crochet double_crochet space space fpdc front post double st stitch crochet tc treble_crochet www eweewe com | facebook com/eweeweyarns | instagram com/eweeweyarns | #eweeweyarns
